TopicTitle: [QUESTION] What is your opinion on KerbalX?

Articles.Content: Found this website [http://www.kerbalx.com](http://www.kerbalx.com) about six weeks ago and was wondering what everyone thought about it. Is it a great way to share craft or is there another site you feel is better?

I like it, but then I am biased because it is run by my forum-friend [Katateochi](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/35203-katateochi). ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
its the only place to find crafts easy and with a focus on detail and easy to manage if you have your own crafts. its the kerbalstuff of craft files.
Now that i know it exists i like it lol ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
